title: Riot please confirm about how to get Hextech Chest
body:
Hi all,

Based on http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/site/2016-season-update/champion-mastery.html
> Mastery Chests Earn locked Mastery Chests by performing well across a variety of champions or as part of a team. When you or someone in your premade party earns any S rank, you’ll acquire a chest. You can earn up to four chests each month, and each champion you play can earn you one chest per season. You’ll see which champs you’re eligible for in champ select and on your champ details page.

Is it random loot?
I have been getting S ranks lately and I got none even though there are 4 chest icons in my profile
Can I please ask Riot staffs to confirm this?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Are you getting S ranks on champions you own? or champions that are part of the free rotation?
its my own in ranked game

>You can earn up to four chests each month, **and each champion you play can earn you one chest per season.**

Have you already earnt a chest from that champion this season?
No worries, glad this was worked out.
